name: C-Cure Corp. PaverMix 928
description: C-Cure Corp. PaverMix 928 is a grouting compound designed for joints 1/2" to 1" (13 to 25 mm) usually associated with terra cotta tile, such as Mexican, Brazilian and Spanish tile. PAVERMIX is a blend of Portland cement, specially graded silica sand and chemical additives that form a dense matrix, free from any voids. It offers ease of cleanup, high compressive strengths and low shrinkage.
